message: I constantly go back to Textmate because of a couple of features that are missing in Vim. One of them is the Tasks list. By Tasks I mean TODO, CHANGED, FIXME etc. So is there a Vim plugin that lists all the tasks in the files under the current NERDtree directory?

function! s:ToDoList ()
    cclose
    let out = system('ack --column "(TODO|CHANGED|FIXME)"')
    let tasks = split(out, '[^\n]\n[^\n]\zs')
    let task_list = []
    for t in tasks
        let thist = split(t, ':')
        let task_list += [{'filename': thist[0], 'lnum': thist[1], 'col': thist[2], 'text': substitute(join(thist[3:-1]), '\s\+', ' ', '')}]
    endfor
    call setqflist(task_list, 'r')
    copen
endfunction
command! ToDoList call <SID>ToDoList()
map <Leader>td :ToDoList<CR>
I'm not sure what var stores the current NERDtree directory since I don't use NERDtree but that should get you started.
